cab.content: Document Is the Property ofSECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 13th MAY, 1918.1, There is no change In the general situation.2* We discharged 3,000 gas cylinders on the front H0HE1IZ0LLERN REDOUBT - HULLUCH under very favourable weather conditions.General Staff,War Office, S.W.I. loth May, 1918.Issued at 12*30 pc.ni.For5 the personal iofopmatsor I -of tho Minister only.
